title: When Do Fat Girls Get to Be the Main Character?
description:
We’re not used to reading about bigger bodies that are lovable and heroic—let alone desirable. I’ve had people tell me that a plus size character is “unrealistic.” Really? You believe in fae and monsters and magic, but not a fat main character?

description:

title: Apple Is Sneaking More Ads Onto Your Phone
description:
Starting tomorrow, Apple will start showing more ads in its App Store, according to an email reviewed by MacRumors. The change is small, but it’s the latest chapter in a growing trend. After years of branding itself as the privacy company, Apple is gunning for the digital ad business—albeit one that’s a little bit…

description:

title: From E. Coli to Flesh-Eating Bacteria, Floodwaters Are a Health Nightmare
description:

But while the immediate dangers involved drowning and injuries, an invisible threat would soon sicken some people who came in contact with the water:…

title: Oldest Human DNA Found in the UK Reveals Origins of Early Britons
description:
Researchers investigating ancient remains found in England and Wales have determined that they contain some of the oldest human DNA ever obtained in the United Kingdom. The DNA indicates Britain was occupied by two unrelated groups, which the scientists believe migrated to the island at the end of the last ice age.

title: Secretary of Transportation on Elon Musk's Hyperloop: 'Not on Our Dime'
description:
U.S. Department of Transportation Secretary Pete Buttigieg says that although Elon Musk’s “Hyperloop” idea is “super interesting,” he doesn’t believe government money should fund it. “Sure, try it,” he said, “but we’ll probably not try it on our dime.”

description:

title: Saudi Arabia Breaks Ground on Massive Sci-Fi Megacity
description:

description:
